experience.position: MSc in Electrical Engineering and Information Technology
experience.description: After graduating from FHNW I started the Master of Science study to deepen my knowledge in electronics and math.

experience.position: BSc in Electrical Engineering and Information Technology
experience.description: During my full time studies at FHNW, I acquired the fundamental knowledge in electronics and could apply the learned in semester projects. Highlights during this time were the **grade 6.0** for the Bachelor’s Thesis and an **average mark of 5.5** over the whole studies.
Assignment included hardware prototyping and testing as well as writing extensive measurement protocols to verify a products market suitability.

After the compulsory school I started my apprenticeship in electronics with simultaneous professional matura. A highlight was the participation at SwissSkills championships where I scored [third place](https://www.swiss-skills.ch/files/Files/30_CHM/Ranglisten/Rangliste_Classement_Classifica_2014_-SwissSkills_Bern.pdf)
